name: Masterless Starglitter
desc: Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.\nSurplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

name: Masterless Stardust
desc: Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.\nSurplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

name: Intertwined Fate
desc: A fateful stone that connects dreams.\nIts glimmers can entwine fates and connect dreams, just as how its glimmers links stars into the shapes of a heart's desires.

name: Acquaint Fate
desc: A seed that lights up the night.\nNo matter the distance apart, guided by the stone's glimmer, the fated will meet under the stars.

name: Pyro Sigil
desc: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

name: Hydro Sigil
desc: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

name: Dendro Sigil
desc: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

name: Electro Sigil
desc: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

name: Anemo Sigil
desc: An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.\nCan be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

name: Cryo Sigil
desc: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

name: Geo Sigil
desc: An insignia that shows the recognition of the cliffs of Liyue.\nCan be exchanged for special items in Liyue.

name: Memory of Eternal Flames
desc: The missing star from the Talents of a Pyro-aligned Traveler.

name: Memory of Running Stream
desc: The missing star from the Talents of a Hydro-aligned Traveler.

name: Memory of Flourishing Green
desc: The missing star from the Talents of a Dendro-aligned Traveler.

desc: The missing star from the Talents of an Electro-aligned Traveler.

name: Memory of Roving Gales
desc: The missing star from the Talents of an Anemo-aligned Traveler.

name: Memory of Piercing Frost
desc: The missing star from the Talents of a Cryo-aligned Traveler.

name: Memory of Immovable Crystals
desc: The missing star from the Talents of a Geo-aligned Traveler.

name: Gnostic Hymn - Old Notes
desc: An early draft of a traveler's tale, recording the many things they saw on their journey across the lands. But why does it exist? It is almost as if you have been here before...\n\nUse this item to unlock Gnostic Hymn for a single period.

name: Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon
localeName: Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon
desc: A ritual prayer, recited on the rising of the first new moon, to ask for the moon's blessing in the form of wealth and good fortune. For your purposes, the new moon you shall pray to is the first-ever new moon in Teyvat, since it's the first one you've seen here.\n\nUse this item to receive 30 days of Blessing of the Welkin Moon rewards.

name: Northlander Sword Prototype
desc: Weapon crafting material. Can be used to forge 4-Star swords. \nPhilosophers believe marbles have the potential to be sculpted into beautiful statures. These prototypes also have unlimited potential.

name: Northlander Bow Prototype
desc: Weapon crafting material. Can be used to forge 4-Star bows. \nPhilosophers believe marbles have the potential to be sculpted into beautiful statures. These prototypes also have unlimited potential.

name: Northlander Claymore Prototype
desc: Weapon crafting material. Can be used to forge 4-Star claymores. \nPhilosophers believe marbles have the potential to be sculpted into beautiful statures. These prototypes also have unlimited potential.

name: Northlander Catalyst Prototype
desc: Weapon crafting material. Can be used to forge 4-Star catalysts. \nPhilosophers believe marbles have the potential to be sculpted into beautiful statures. These prototypes also have unlimited potential.

name: Northlander Polearm Prototype
desc: Weapon crafting material. Can be used to forge 4-Star polearms. \nPhilosophers believe marbles have the potential to be sculpted into beautiful statures. These prototypes also have unlimited potential.

name: Brilliant Diamond Sliver
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

name: Brilliant Diamond Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

name: Brilliant Diamond Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

name: Brilliant Diamond Gemstone
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Welcome to this world."

name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
desc: Character Ascension Material.

name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"A pilgrimage for a wish, a battle to earn a name...\nBurnt to cinders for a dream."

name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
"Burnt to cinders for a dream.
"If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
desc: Character Ascension Material.

name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"My ideals have no stains."

name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"My ideals have no stains.\nI must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

name: Nagadus Emerald Sliver
desc: Character Ascension Material.

name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"In the end, life opened its closed fist..."

name: Nagadus Emerald Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"In the end, life opened its closed fist...\ngranting freedom of life to all."

name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
desc:
Character Ascension material.
"In the end, life opened its closed fist...
"granting freedom to all.
"Men and animals have the ability to express themselves but the plants do not. Therefore, they need a spokesperson."

name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
desc: Character Ascension Material.

name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.\nIt should hold absolute control over this world."

name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

name: Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
desc: Character Ascension Material.

name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Still, the winds change direction."

name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Still, the winds change direction.\nSomeday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

name: Shivada Jade Sliver
desc: Character Ascension Material.

name: Shivada Jade Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Sorry..."

name: Shivada Jade Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"Sorry..."\n"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
desc: Character Ascension Material.

name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
desc: Character Ascension material.\n"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.\nFor thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

name: Teachings of Freedom
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nFreedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.\nThe freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

name: Guide to Freedom
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nFreedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.\nThe freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

name: Philosophies of Freedom
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nFreedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.\nTo sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

name: Teachings of Resistance
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nResistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.\nThe history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

name: Guide to Resistance
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nResistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.\nThe history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

name: Philosophies of Resistance
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nResistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.\nThe history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

name: Teachings of Ballad
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nPoetry is the soul of the land of the wind.\nPoetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

name: Guide to Ballad
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nPoetry is the soul of the land of the wind.\nPoetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

name: Philosophies of Ballad
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nPoetry is the soul of the land of the wind.\nPoetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

name: Teachings of Prosperity
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nProsperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.\nProsperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

name: Guide to Prosperity
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nProsperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.\nProsperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

name: Philosophies of Prosperity
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nProsperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.\nProsperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

name: Teachings of Diligence
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nIndustriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.\nDiligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

name: Guide to Diligence
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nIndustriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.\nIndustriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

name: Philosophies of Diligence
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nIndustriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.\nIndustriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

name: Teachings of Gold
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nGold is the symbol of the land of Geo.\nGold is the blood that flows deep within Liyue's veins, the muscle that makes up Liyue's beating heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.

name: Guide to Gold
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nGold is the symbol of the land of Geo.\nGold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

name: Philosophies of Gold
desc: Talent Level-Up material.\nGold is the symbol of the land of Geo.\nGold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

name: Crown of Insight
desc: A precious Talent Level-Up material.\nOnce a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

name: Fragile Resin
desc: An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.\nThis crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin.\nThe flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in this world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

name: Suspicious Fisherman's Toast
desc: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.

name: Fisherman's Toast
desc: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.

name: Delicious Fisherman's Toast
desc: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?

name: Suspicious Teyvat Fried Egg
desc: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.

name: Teyvat Fried Egg
desc: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.

name: Delicious Teyvat Fried Egg
desc: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

name: Suspicious Steak
desc: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.

name: Steak
desc: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

name: Delicious Steak
desc: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.

name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
desc: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.

name: Suspicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
desc: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.

name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
desc: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!

name: Delicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
desc: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.

name: Fruity Skewers
desc: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste. Wait... Is this really the smell of fruit?

name: Suspicious Flaming Red Bolognese
desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.

name: Flaming Red Bolognese
desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.

name: Delicious Flaming Red Bolognese
desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.

name: Mysterious Bolognese
desc: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aura, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?

name: Suspicious Radish Veggie Soup
desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.

name: Radish Veggie Soup
desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.

name: Delicious Radish Veggie Soup
desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.

name: Suspicious Tea Break Pancake
desc: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.

name: Tea Break Pancake
desc: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.

name: Delicious Tea Break Pancake
desc: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.

name: Suspicious Fried Radish Balls
desc: Fried Radish Balls. Way too oily, and leaves you looking for something to drink to cut through the grease.

name: Fried Radish Balls
desc: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.

name: Delicious Fried Radish Balls
desc: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.

name: Suspicious Satisfying Salad
desc: A vegetable salad. Regrettably, it seems the best time to plate the potatoes and boiled eggs was missed.

name: Satisfying Salad
desc: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.

name: Delicious Satisfying Salad
desc: A vegetable salad. Fresh, light, and varied. You'd never get tired of eating this, even if you had to eat it for the rest of your life.

name: Suspicious Sweet Madame
desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.

name: Sweet Madame
desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.

name: Delicious Sweet Madame
desc: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.

name: Suspicious Northern Smoked Chicken
desc: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. It's true. You really ought to try your own cooking before serving it to your guests. It's not too late to make a new one, perhaps?

name: Northern Smoked Chicken
desc: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.

name: Delicious Northern Smoked Chicken
desc: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A dish fit for a king. Go on, find one and serve him with pride.

name: Suspicious Cream Stew
desc: A meat and vegetable stew. Surprisingly dry for something that's meant to have liquid.

name: Cream Stew
desc: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.

name: Delicious Cream Stew
desc: A meat and vegetable stew. These warm, buttery ingredients are so good that you almost want to dive into the cream stew and cuddle up with them.

name: Spicy Stew
desc: Barbara's specialty. Carrots cut into cute little stars make this dish... Wait, AHH, where did this spiciness come from!?

name: Suspicious Mushroom Pizza
desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.

name: Mushroom Pizza
desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm the cheese stretches out long, making it extremely satisfying to eat.

name: Delicious Mushroom Pizza
desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.

name: Invigorating Pizza
desc: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?

name: Suspicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?

name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.

name: Delicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.

name: Puppy-Paw Hash Brown
desc: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.

name: Suspicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The bitterness of the calla lily, the astringency of the mint, the fishiness of the crab... Getting all the negatives together like this takes skill.

name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.

name: Delicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.

name: Suspicious Sautéed Matsutake
desc: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. A shame that control of the fire was lost. Best you can do now is try to trick people who didn't see you cooking it into thinking they are just potato chips.

name: Sautéed Matsutake
desc: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. Cooked in butter, it's crisp outside yet tender inside. Eat it before someone steals it from you.

name: Delicious Sautéed Matsutake
desc: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. So smooth and fragrant, eating them is like having the bursting vitality of spring absorbed into your stomach.

name: Suspicious "Pile 'Em Up"
desc: A rich, meaty dish. The meat must have been stacked wrong... Yeah, that's it. Now, can this actually be served...?

name: "Pile 'Em Up"
desc: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.

name: Delicious "Pile 'Em Up"
desc: A rich, meaty dish. Piled in just the right way to be both aesthetically pleasing and delicious all the way through. I wonder if we can pile it a little higher...

name: "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt"
desc: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?

name: Suspicious Cold Cut Platter
desc: A plate of cold cut meat. Seems a little too cold, probably not good for those with bad teeth or sensitive stomachs.

name: Cold Cut Platter
desc: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.

name: Delicious Cold Cut Platter
desc: A plate of cold cut meat. The seasoning is just delightful enough to bring out the flavors perfectly. With a mouth full of meaty ecstasy, one worries about nothing.

name: Suspicious Sticky Honey Roast
desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The sauce has stuck like glue to the meat, forming a homogeneous mass that tastes neither of honey nor meat.

name: Sticky Honey Roast
desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.

name: Delicious Sticky Honey Roast
desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.

name: Suspicious Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
desc: A somewhat luxurious bake. By looking at it, no-one can tell what it is made of... or what it lacks.

name: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
desc: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!

name: Delicious Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
desc: A luxurious bake. The scent is so rich and heavenly. You'll only be done once you've licked the plate clean.

name: Suspicious Jade Parcels
desc: An exquisite-looking dish. Food ingredients of different degrees of doneness are wrapped in shriveled vegetables. It looks depressing to say the least.

name: Jade Parcels
desc: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.

name: Delicious Jade Parcels
desc: An exquisite-looking dish. The sweetness of the ham and the crisp lotus seeds are a match made in heaven. The aromatic broth pours down like the dawning light, caressing your tongue with an unworldly delicious taste.

name: Suspicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Even if the dish was extremely delicious, it surely doesn't look the part. Even the most popular stalls would have trouble selling this.

name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is actually a swear word in the local language.

name: Delicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. The authentic "Liyue taste" of this aromatic dish makes it a comfort food for golden-agers that may bring a tear to their eyes.

name: Suspicious Black-Back Perch Stew
desc: A poached fish dish. It has essentially lost all the taste of the fish itself to the spicy taste of the chili peppers. Only a selected few enjoy such a sensory overload on their tongues.

name: Black-Back Perch Stew
desc: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.

name: Delicious Black-Back Perch Stew
desc: A poached fish dish. The fish fillets are so tender and juicy that they almost seem to come alive in your mouth. The sense of loss is so unbearable when you swallowed a piece down that you just had to treat yourself to another piece.

name: Suspicious Squirrel Fish
desc: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. Sure, you can make out the shape of the fish, but you can't see how it's related to any squirrel. It just proves that the more complicated the dish is to prepare, the harder it is to prepare it well.

name: Squirrel Fish
desc: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.

name: Delicious Squirrel Fish
desc: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is expertly handled to exhibit an elegant shape; however, the exquisitely balanced sweet-and-sour taste is really where the dish truly comes alive. The culinary skills involved in preparing this dish can impress even the greatest chefs of Liyue.

name: Suspicious Almond Tofu
desc: A dessert made from ground almonds. The almond milk is chilled without being properly ground and strained. You can only lie to yourself that its rough texture is what makes it special.

name: Almond Tofu
desc: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.

name: Delicious Almond Tofu
desc: A dessert made from ground almonds. It has the exquisite look and texture of a piece of white jade, and could pass as an art piece — so much so that you could not entertain the idea of actually eating it.

name: Suspicious Jueyun Chili Chicken
desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken probably isn't properly marinated, so it's only salty on the outside but bland on the inside. The taste reminds you of water-poached chicken breasts.

name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.

name: Delicious Jueyun Chili Chicken
desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken is extremely tender, juicy, and sweet. The delicious taste transports you to the realm of dreams.

name: Suspicious Jewelry Soup
desc: A simple vegetable soup. The bland soup and dull vegetables remind you of the dying vegetables on abandoned and barren farmlands.

name: Jewelry Soup
desc: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.

name: Delicious Jewelry Soup
desc: A simple vegetable soup. The mild-tasting soup is filled with the fragrance of fresh vegetables. This down-to-earth and heart-warming soup can rival any luxurious dish.

name: Suspicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
desc: A pan-fried meat dish. Though the dry and tough texture is miles away from what it could be, the Matsutake is too nutritious to let it go to waste.

name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
desc: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.

name: Delicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
desc: A pan-fried meat dish. It combines the essences of the mountains and the nourishments of the celestial bodies. It is a very nutritious dish that will surely bring a smile to your face.

name: Suspicious Mora Meat
desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.

name: Mora Meat
desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.

name: Delicious Mora Meat
desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.

name: Suspicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire. Sadly, it's a bit too well done. The charred smell and the dry texture are not too impressive.

name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.

name: Delicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, locking the delicious juice inside the meat under the crispy skin. A small bite is all that's needed to unlock its wondrous and delicious taste.

name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Filet
desc: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.

name: Stir-Fried Filet
desc: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.

name: Delicious Stir-Fried Filet
desc: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.

name: Suspicious Golden Crab
desc: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The flour granules within have congealed like gravel, and have some crab shell mixed in. But compared to the blandness of the crab meat, the taste of crab shell is at least worth having a go at.

name: Golden Crab
desc: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The crab has been chopped into pieces and battered with flour, before being stir-fried till golden and rich with flavor. It is worthy of the word "gold," whether in terms of appearance or quality.

name: Delicious Golden Crab
desc: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The aroma of the crab meat inundates the room the instant it leaves the frying pan, and a single bite fills one's palate with the countless rustic flavors of a fishing village hometown. It seems that such simple yet timeless village customs held the secret to this lavish, golden sumptuousness all along.

name: Suspicious Crystal Shrimp
desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The dull outer skin has a rather sticky mouthfeel which, when combined with the dry stuffing within, makes this dish a torment best ended sooner.

name: Crystal Shrimp
desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.

name: Delicious Crystal Shrimp
desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The outer skin is as clear its crystal namesake, and when it enters the mouth, one's tongue could be forgiven for thinking that the fresh shrimp within is still alive. Those who eat it can only lament that four pieces per serving is far, far too few.

name: Suspicious Grilled Tiger Fish
desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. You can barely see that this charred lump is indeed grilled fish, and upon further investigation, the fish scales mixed in confirm that this is indeed the case.

name: Grilled Tiger Fish
desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.

name: Delicious Grilled Tiger Fish
desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The shimmering golden skin has locked the fresh and tender meat in. You cannot help but sigh in satisfaction as you chew on it. Not a scrap of meat here will go uneaten, not even those stuck firmly to the bamboo stick.

name: Suspicious Barbatos Ratatouille
desc: A simple chowder with a long history. Thought the Anemo Archon is said to symbolize freedom, perhaps this dish has been a bit too liberal in the making. Perhaps the name Stormy Stew might be more fitting here.

name: Barbatos Ratatouille
desc: A simple chowder with a long history. The ingredients are similarly traditional and simple. No matter where you are, a piping-hot chowder of this sort can always give you a sense of real and unsurpassed satisfaction.

name: Delicious Barbatos Ratatouille
desc: A simple chowder with a long history. After much careful stewing, the flavors of three different vegetables have been blended to perfection. Like this, it is not hard to imagine why someone once called it "the best chowder I've ever tasted."

name: A Buoyant Breeze
desc: Venti's specialty. Other than the Cecilia flowers used for decoration, the ingredients are no different from normal. But if you taste it carefully, you can taste the flavor of "a wind that brings hope and tiny twists of fate." Perhaps... this is exactly what he wants.

name: Der Weisheit Letzter Schluss (Life)
desc: Mona's specialty. A great work from a great astrologer. Its greatest aspect lies with its cost-effectiveness in filling one's stomach.

name: Fish-Flavored Toast
desc: Klee's specialty. By way of apology for wantonly using her bombs to scare away the fish, Jean instructed Klee to make this toast for the fishermen. It's filling and tasty. Klee will never starve again, even after a whole day of blast fishing.

name: Teyvat Charred Egg
desc: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lends a whole new flavor to the dish.

name: Die Heilige Sinfonie
desc: Fischl's specialty. The exquisite presentation doth seem to communicate some incomprehensible enigma. When partaking, if one were to gaze upon Fischl, one might see her expectant gaze peek through the gaps of her fingers, which she is using to cover half her face... Is this also part of the mystery?

name: Lighter-Than-Air Pancake
desc: Noelle's specialty. These thick pastries are the special afternoon snacks of the Knights of Favonius. They give people the sense that they have fallen upon a layer of fluffy clouds, and seeing Noelle's smile makes the feeling all the sweeter!

name: Suspicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
localeName: Suspicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
desc: A steamed egg dish. The lengthy steaming process has caused unusual honeycomb figure to appear on the surface of the egg custard. It goes without saying that there isn't hardly a hint of bitterness left in the lotus.

name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
localeName: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
desc: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.

name: Delicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
localeName: Delicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
desc: A steamed egg dish. The succulent eggs melt right in your mouth, and before you know it, a smooth and subtle sweetness of newly sprung lotus flowers covers your tastebuds.

name: Suspicious Adeptus' Temptation
desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. Without having mastered the art of simmering, the resulting stew-like dish has a salty, fishy taste. But, just considering the costly ingredients will be enough to keep you going until the pot's empty.

name: Adeptus' Temptation
desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine, in which specially selected ingredients are submerged and slowly boiled in soup stock. The recipe scribbled from memory alone was enough to urge the adepti to once again return to the world of men.

name: Delicious Adeptus' Temptation
desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. This dish is a rare and exquisite mix of both land and sea, combining countless delicious delicacies in one flavor-filled pot. Each mouthful is a moment to remember — it's even irresistible enough to entice the adepti down from their celestial abode.

name: Suspicious Golden Shrimp Balls
desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. Hastily cast into hot oil and promptly forgotten about, the result is a disastrous combination of raw shrimp and burnt potato strips.

name: Golden Shrimp Balls
desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.

name: Delicious Golden Shrimp Balls
desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. From the rich, indulgent scent of crispy golden potato strips, to the satisfying crunch as you take your first bite, to the grand finale of delicious sweet shrimp, this dish is pure pleasure.

name: Suspicious Qingce Stir Fry
desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. This one was a failed test run, being unpleasantly bitter and uncomfortably spicy. You could try mixing it with rice — or you could simply discard it and eat the rice instead.

name: Qingce Stir Fry
desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.

name: Delicious Qingce Stir Fry
desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. Just catching a whiff is enough to work up one's appetite. The tingle of chili titillates the tongue, leaving you ready to devour ten bowls in a single sitting.

name: Suspicious Come and Get It
desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients... dumped into scalding-hot water and boiled beyond recognition. As if the taste of everything and nothing at the same time isn't bad enough, you'll want to watch out for the sand, too...

name: Come and Get It
desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.

name: Delicious Come and Get It
desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. The mixture of meat and vegetables is spot-on, the presentation is flawless, and the blend of flavors in the broth brings out the best of everything. Don't mind if I do.

name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
desc: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!

name: Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish
desc: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.

name: All-Delicacy Parcels
desc: Xingqiu's specialty. This dish's almost artisan appearance makes one almost reluctant to tuck in. But once you get a taste, its fresh, light and lovely sweetness will make the dish hard to put down.... Hang on a moment. Did he throw the carrots out, by any chance?

name: "Sweet Dream"
desc: Xiao's specialty. His dream is very simple, and it is merely a lovely dream.

name: Flash-Fried Filet
desc: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.

name: Qiankun Mora Meat
desc: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?

name: No Tomorrow
desc: Qiqi's specialty. The neat rows of ingredients seem at once exotic and delicious, and Baizhu says that Qiqi has spent a long time creating this dish. Still, once one considers that Qiqi has no sense of taste, just putting chopsticks to the food is going to take some courage.

name: Suspicious Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.

name: Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.

name: Delicious Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles have absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.

name: Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
desc: Chongyun's specialty. Though these springy noodles would be irresistible in the sweltering summer, Chongyun insists on dining on them even in the chattering cold of winter. What a guy.

name: Survival Grilled Fish
desc: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.

name: Nutritious Meal (V.593)
desc: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?

name: Holy Water
desc: A bottle of clear, colorless, and contaminant-free liquid. Indistinguishable from ordinary spring water. May or may not be worth putting all of one's hopes into.

name: Pop's Teas
desc: Tea from Liyue. After a grueling trek around the vast region of Liyue, there's nothing more rejuvenating than a big swig of tea from Pop's Teas.

name: Wolfhook Juice
desc: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. Iced Wolfhook juice mixed with a pinch of other ingredients, forming a dreamy shade of violet.

name: Berry & Mint Burst
desc: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. A refreshing burst of Mint with Berries to sweeten the deal, it has an exquisite aroma.

name: Apple Cider
desc: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. Said to have a strong sobering effect, tavern patrons often order this as the last drink of the night.

name: Suspicious Bamboo Shoot Soup
desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The inexpert heat control has caused the fresh meat to be a bit tough, and the salty ham has covered the expected taste. The bamboo shoots, which have absorbed the flavors of both meats, are probably the only acceptable part of this dish.

name: Bamboo Shoot Soup
desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The meat and ham have been diced into small pieces, and the soup has been kept on low heat till it turned milky white. The process has brought out the distinct flavors of both kinds of meat, making for an especially tasty soup.

name: Delicious Bamboo Shoot Soup
desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. One whiff is enough to whet one's appetite greatly, and the concentrated flavors fill your body with every spoonful of soup. It is almost like spreading a pair of wings and walking on clouds.

name: Suspicious Triple-Layered Consommé
desc: A neatly-arranged dish. It certainly looks the part, but tasting it reveals the blandness of the consommé. Was it diluted too much, perhaps?

name: Triple-Layered Consommé
desc: A neatly-arranged dish. The ham, fowl, and bamboo shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.

name: Delicious Triple-Layered Consommé
desc: A neatly-arranged dish. The evenly-sized threads reveal exquisite knife-work. Rather than a dish, this seems more like a work of art. But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss — leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.

name: Suspicious Tianshu Meat
desc: A braised meat dish. It's been braised for too long, resulting in meat that's too soft. The fatty cuts are greasy enough to give you palpitations, and you can barely scarf them down when wrapped in the small lamp grass.

name: Tianshu Meat
desc: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.

name: Delicious Tianshu Meat
desc: A braised meat dish. Its intense aroma can be detected from miles away. The ingredients look exquisite in every way, capturing the essence of its original design. It would not look out of place on a gourmet spread at Yuehai Pavilion.

name: Suspicious Lotus Flower Crisp
desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The lotus petals have lost their original color, turning brown and wilted under the merciless heat of hot oil.

name: Lotus Flower Crisp
desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.

name: Delicious Lotus Flower Crisp
desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The flower petals waver to life if you gently blow on them. As you close your eyes and take a bite, a luscious flavor covers your tastebuds like a sweet harmony of blooming flowers and fluttering birds in the breeze.

name: Suspicious Moon Pie
desc: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. The burnt-yellow meringue looks barely passable. Don't let any Mondstadt locals see you dead with this thing, or they might just take it upon themselves to ensure that you never fail again.

name: Moon Pie
desc: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.

name: Delicious Moon Pie
desc: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. As you cut a slice off this small meat pie, the aromas of butter and meat assault your senses simultaneously. The rustic, sweet mouthfeel reminds you of the sights and sounds of harvest festivals, bringing a smile unbidden to your face.

name: Suspicious Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
desc: A nutritious egg dish. The congealed mayonnaise is almost solid, and it is lined with tough ham and over-boiled egg. At least wolfing it down will make you full all the same.

name: Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
desc: A nutritious egg dish. Luxurious mayonnaise sits atop a lining of ham and poached egg toast. The smooth mouthfeel fills you with energy for the long road ahead, and is one of the Adventurers' Guild's top-rated breakfasts.

name: Delicious Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
desc: A nutritious egg dish. The mayonnaise rises like the sun over the rippling poached egg's surface, and the exquisite mouthfeel really hits the spot. The unique salty flavor of the ham cuts right through the mix as well, like light parting the gathered clouds.

name: Suspicious Northern Apple Stew
desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. Apart from a slight sourness, it tastes just like any other down-to-earth braised meat dish, and lacks any fruity aroma. One might even wonder if the apples were put in there at all.

name: Northern Apple Stew
desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.

name: Delicious Northern Apple Stew
desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.

name: Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup
desc: Zhongli's specialty. The ham is a butt end selected according to Yuehai Pavilion's gourmet standards. The fresh meat is pork belly, freshly hunted in Springvale, while the bamboo shoots are the densest you'll find in Qingce Village. It is then heated, slowly, gently, and with the utmost care and technique... Such a "particular" taste may only be shared with those who know how to appreciate it.

name: Rockin' Riffin' Chicken!
desc: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!

name: A Prize Catch
desc: Tartaglia's specialty. It looks like a trapped beast floundering in an ocean of blood, its death throes an inaudible scream... But Tartaglia smiles and explains that this is something he fished out of the sea, with some products from his homeland on the side.

name: Suspicious Universal Peace
desc: Colorful staple food. Too much moisture was lost during the cooking process — at this point, it would take some imagination (and some extra water) to recoup the intended taste.

name: Universal Peace
desc: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.

name: Delicious Universal Peace
desc: Colorful staple food. The sweet-and-sour preserved fruit is bound to the rich mouthfeel of the rice as if by invisible threads. Even after you swallow, the faint fragrance remains on your lips, increasing your sense of satisfaction by an order of magnitude.

name: Suspicious Goulash
desc: A steaming-hot stew. There was some flaw in the flame control during the stewing process, leading to a product with a very stiff mouthfeel. You can ignore those flaws if you scarf it all down — it'll keep the cold away regardless.

name: Goulash
desc: Hot stew made from Chilled Meat and vegetables chopped into small pieces. Slow-boiled tomatoes give this dish a rich and thick texture. Filling one's stomach with this comforting mixture has a warming effect.

name: Delicious Goulash
desc: A steaming-hot stew. Just one spoonful sends a down-to-earth sense of satisfaction welling up from the depths of your heart. The meat's flavor grows with every chew, bringing limitless strength to the eater even in the coldest wintry wastes.

name: Suspicious Sunshine Sprat
desc: Gently fried fish dish. The fish has been fried too long, which has deprived it of all its freshness and springiness. The slightest touch with your utensils might cause it to break into small pieces.

name: Sunshine Sprat
desc: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.

name: Delicious Sunshine Sprat
desc: Gently fried fish dish. The fish melts in your mouth, melding the flavors of land and sea together as it does, making for an unforgettable experience. Little wonder, then, that such a simply-made dish can make it into restaurants of great class.

name: Suspicious Jueyun Guoba
desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. The browned Jueyun Chilis and ham stick together on top of a crust that has barely retained its flavor, and you can only tell them apart by the mouthfeel.

name: Jueyun Guoba
desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.

name: Delicious Jueyun Guoba
desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Chow down on that lovely, fragrant crust and the steaming ham sitting atop it. The spices and spiciness race neck and neck into your nostrils, creating an addictive flavor that has you licking that last finger rather than let a single scrap go to waste.

name: Prosperous Peace
desc: Ganyu's specialty. The image of a resting qilin is by itself enough to calm a person down. Ganyu has put her well-wishes for all that is lovely in this world into this dish — and she's saved some of her favorite Qingxin Flowers just for you, too.

name: Woodland Dream
desc: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.

name: Recipe: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Chicken-Mushroom Skewer.

name: Recipe: Fisherman's Toast
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fisherman's Toast.

name: Recipe: Flaming Red Bolognese
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Flaming Red Bolognese.

name: Recipe: Sweet Madame
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sweet Madame.

name: Recipe: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Calla Lily Seafood Soup.

name: Recipe: Sautéed Matsutake
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sautéed Matsutake.

name: Recipe: Teyvat Fried Egg
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Teyvat Fried Egg.

name: Recipe: Northern Smoked Chicken
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Northern Smoked Chicken.

name: Recipe: Cream Stew
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cream Stew.

name: Recipe: Cold Cut Platter
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Cold Cut Platter.

name: Recipe: Sticky Honey Roast
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Sticky Honey Roast.

name: Recipe: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake.

name: Recipe: Mushroom Pizza
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Mushroom Pizza.

name: Recipe: Steak
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Steak.

name: Recipe: Radish Veggie Soup
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Radish Veggie Soup.

name: Recipe: Mondstadt Hash Brown
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Mondstadt Hash Brown.

name: Recipe: "Pile 'Em Up"
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making "Pile 'Em Up."

name: Recipe: Tea Break Pancake
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Tea Break Pancake.

name: Recipe: Fried Radish Balls
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fried Radish Balls.

name: Recipe: Satisfying Salad
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Satisfying Salad.

name: Recipe: Jade Parcels
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Jade Parcels.

name: Recipe: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mondstadt Grilled Fish.

name: Recipe: Mora Meat
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mora Meat.

name: Recipe: Stir-Fried Filet
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Stir-Fried Filet.

name: Recipe: Almond Tofu
